root.name: BIT.TRIP Presents: Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien
root.description: OverviewBit.Trip Presents: RUNNER 2, Future Legend of Rhythm Alien is a direct sequel to the original Bit.Trip RUNNER. It expands on it's predecessor by including new abilities, multiple playable characters, HD graphics, unlockable outfits and checkpoints. The game will be released on February 26, 2013 for PC, Mac, Wii U, XBLM, and PS3's PlayStation Network, with a PlayStation Vita and iPad version following some time later.StoryThe game follows Commander Video as he tracks down the nefarious Timbletot throughout various planets to stop his plot to end all worlds.GameplayNew additions to the game include Checkpoints, which are completely optional: upon coming to the Checkpoint line, the player may decide to jump over it to initiate the stage's Challenge mode, at the cost of returning to the start of the stage upon death. Also added is a Donkey Kong Country-esque end of level cannonball bonus shot, given only for completing the stage with all the Gold collectibles.System RequirementsPCMinimumOS: Windows XP SP3Memory: 2 GB memoryGraphics: GeForce 8 series or Radeon HD4 seriesDirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 850 MB free hard drive spaceRecommendedOS: Windows 7Memory: 4 GB memoryGraphics: GeForce 8 series or Radeon HD4 seriesDirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 850 MB free hard drive spaceMacMinimumOS: 10.6.8 Snow LeopardMemory: 2 GB memoryGraphics: GeForce 8 series or Radeon HD4 seriesHard Drive: 850 MB free hard drive spaceRecommendedOS: 10.6.8 Snow LeopardMemory: 8 GB memoryGraphics: GeForce 8 series or Radeon HD4 seriesHard Drive: 850 MB free hard drive spaceLinuxMinimumOS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTSMemory: 2 GB memoryGraphics: GeForce 8 series or Radeon HD4 seriesHard Drive: 850 MB free hard drive spaceRecommendedOS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTSMemory: 8 GB memoryGraphics: GeForce 8 series or Radeon HD4 seriesHard Drive: 850 MB free hard drive space
